Articles.Content: I'm looking for a mod that will allow me to plan launch windows. I believe Mechjeb used to allow a pork hop plot from the launch pad, but this doesn't seem to be an option anymore? I've seen other mods that will do it from orbit as well... But are there any mods that will do it from the launch pad? There's no reason a lunar insertion maneuver should take 35 days...

I belive "kerbal alarm clock" is what you are looking for

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/220289-kerbal-alarm-clock

A launch window to Mun? Are you trying to go straight up or something?

However you like to launch, just do it, and when your ship gets to Mun's orbit note how far away Mun is and in what direction. Revert, and then time warp so your ship is in the correct position so that this time, if you launch in exactly the same way, Mun will be where you will end up. Memorize that angle and you should be able to hit it most every time.

If you're talking interplanetary transfers, I suggest the Transfer Window Planner mod.
